tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve publicly available information from Lidl's websites. It is compatible with the following websites: www.lidl.de, www.lidl.be, www.lidl.cz, www.lidl.fr, www.lidl.nl, www.lidl.pl, www.lidl.sk. You can use it to fetch data from Search URLs, Product URLs, and Category URLs.
name: Lidl
title: Lidl

api_list.name: Get Product By ID

required_parameters.name: productID
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Search** endpoints

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- de
- be
- cz
- fr
- nl
- pl
- sk

api_list.name: Get Product from URL
Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from URL
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results Page URL
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

api_list.name: Extract URL
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to extract URLs from Lidl's websites.
Supports: www.lidl.de, www.lidl.be, www.lidl.cz, www.lidl.fr, www.lidl.nl, www.lidl.pl, www.lidl.sk

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Can be the following:

- Search Results URL
- Product Page URL
- Category Page URL

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results from keyword and filters.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- de
- be
- cz
- fr
- nl
- pl
- sk

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
**Options:**

- relevance
- lowPrice
- highPrice
- newest
- rating
- bestseller
- discount
